    CommandCall()

    Represents a command call.

    new CommandCall()
    structures/CommandCall.js, line 23

    Properties:
    Name Type Description
    caller string

    The id of the user that made the call.
    callerTag string

    The tag of the user that made the call.
    command Command

    The command for this call.
    commandName string

    The command name.
    commandExists boolean

    Wether the command exists.
    bestMatch string

    The command with best matching name.
    args Array.<string>

    The arguments the command was called with.
    hasEnoughArgs boolean

    Wether the call has enough arguments.
    missingArg string

    The first missing argument if not enough arguments.
    isDM boolean

    Was the command called from a dm?
    isBot boolean

    Did a bot call this command?
    isAdmin boolean

    Does the caller have admin permission?
    isSuperUser boolean

    Is the caller a super user?
    isAlias boolean

    Was the command called through an alias?
    message external:Message

    The message associated with this call.
    time Date

    When the command was called.

    Methods

    parseAndSave(message) → {CommandCall}
    structures/CommandCall.js, line 55

    Parses the message for the command name and args.

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    message external:Message

    The message to be parsed.
    Returns:
    CommandCall -

    The parsed command call.

    A discord bot framework.
